org.spongepowered.api

Interface GameRegistry


  • public interface GameRegistry
    Provides an easy way to retrieve types from a Game.

    Note that the registries may be in flux, especially during game initialization. These will be accurate for the time they are called, however they may change at a later point. Do not assume that the contents of a collection will be all the entries that will exist.

    Some of the returned instances my become incorrect if they are later overwritten. However, this should occur prior to GameState.POST_INITIALIZATION.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        <T extends CatalogType> Optional<T> getType(Class<T> typeClass,
                                            String id)
        Attempts to retrieve the specific type of CatalogType based on the string id given.

        Some types may not be available for various reasons including but not restricted to: mods adding custom types, plugins providing custom types, game version changes.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of catalog type
        Parameters:
        typeClass - The class of the type of CatalogType
        id - The string id of the catalog type
        Returns:
        The found catalog type, if available

      • getAllOf

        <T extends CatalogType> Collection<? extends T> getAllOf(Class<T> typeClass)
        Gets a collection of all available found specific types of CatalogType requested.

        The presented CatalogTypes may not exist in default catalogs due to various reasons including but not restricted to: mods, plugins, game changes.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of CatalogType
        Parameters:
        typeClass - The class of CatalogType
        Returns:
        A collection of all known types of the requested catalog type

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getEntityStatistic

        Optional<EntityStatistic> getEntityStatistic(StatisticGroup statisticGroup,
                                             EntityType entityType)
        Gets the Statistic for the given StatisticGroup and EntityType. If the statistic group is not a valid EntityStatistic group then Optional.absent() will be returned.
        Parameters:
        statisticGroup - The type of statistic to return
        entityType - The entity type for the statistic to return
        Returns:
        The entity statistic or Optional.absent() if not found

      • getItemStatistic

        Optional<ItemStatistic> getItemStatistic(StatisticGroup statisticGroup,
                                         ItemType itemType)
        Gets the Statistic for the given StatisticGroup and ItemType. If the statistic group is not a valid ItemStatistic group then Optional.absent() will be returned.
        Parameters:
        statisticGroup - The type of statistic to return
        itemType - The item type for the statistic to return
        Returns:
        The item statistic or Optional.absent() if not found

      • getBlockStatistic

        Optional<BlockStatistic> getBlockStatistic(StatisticGroup statisticGroup,
                                           BlockType blockType)
        Gets the Statistic for the given StatisticGroup and BlockType. If the statistic group is not a valid BlockStatistic group then Optional.absent() will be returned.
        Parameters:
        statisticGroup - The type of statistic to return
        blockType - The block type for the statistic to return
        Returns:
        The block statistic or Optional.absent() if not found

      • getTeamStatistic

        Optional<TeamStatistic> getTeamStatistic(StatisticGroup statisticGroup,
                                         TextColor teamColor)
        Gets the Statistic for the given StatisticGroup and team's TextColor. If the StatisticGroup is not a valid TeamStatistic group then Optional.absent() will be returned.
        Parameters:
        statisticGroup - The type of statistic to return
        teamColor - The team's color for the statistic to return
        Returns:
        The team statistic or Optional.absent() if not found

        Collection<Statistic> getStatistics(StatisticGroup statisticGroup)
        Gets a list of all available Statistics which belong to the given StatisticGroup.
        Parameters:
        statisticGroup - The statisticType to return
        Returns:
        An immutable collection containing all statistics in the group
